title: Simple Markup Parser
description: Parse a subset of Markdown-like markup with headers, lists, and inline formatting (bold, italic, code).

motivation.why: Lightweight markup languages are essential for documentation, blogging, and content management. Understanding how to parse them enables building custom documentation tools.

inputFormat.description: Simple markup with ATX-style headers (#, ##, ###), unordered lists (- or *), and inline formatting (**bold**, *italic*, `code`).

outputFormat.description: The parser returns a MarkupDocument containing MarkupElement enum values for each parsed element.

MarkupElement.description: Enum: Header{level, text}, Paragraph(String), ListItem(String), Bold(String), Italic(String), Code(String)
